tool.name: Filter/split bam
tool.description: Returnes bam file(s) with reads filtered by mapping quality, without unmapped reads or secondary alignments. Splits by strand of the first read.

param.name: qn
param.label: mapping quality
param.help: reads with mapping quality less or equal will be discarded

param.name: split
param.label: split to separate files by strand of first read

param.name: revert
param.label: Use second read as strand indicator

tool.help:
This tool allows few types of filtering of reads in bam file:
* by mapping - discard not mapped reads * by type of alignment - discard secondary alignments * by quality - discard reads with mapping quality smaller or equal than chosen value
It also allows separation of reads by strand of the first read from pair
